data.title: Great Massage, Highly Recommend!
data.text: Have been to Melted Massage on a few occasions and haven't been disappointed yet.  Each therapist (recently I have had Megan and Morgan) is very skilled in deep tissue, sports massage.  Love how clean it is there and how friendly the staff is.  Their appt system is easy to use I highly recommend.  My wife has had the pregnancy massage there as well and said it was outstanding!
